comments:
We have several Junit plugin tests written. I tried today to install the tech preview for the line coverage plugin ( http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/tptp/4.2.0.1/TPTP-4.2.0.1-200607211630/org.eclipse.tptp.platform.coverage.core-TPTP-4.2.0.1.zip)
I used an callisto install to grab eclipse 3.2 and TPTP.

After importing all my projects and their tests i ran them without enabling line coverage, that went well the tests ran as they was supposed to do.

After enabling the line coverage button in many projects get errors such as:

Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.ClassFormatError: LVTT entry for 'allCheckOuts' in class file com/sonyericsson/ides/releasemanager/ui/logic/test/QualityAssurenceHandlerTest does not match any LVT entry
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

Note the only thing i did was to enable the line coverage button and run the same junit plugin test again. Clicking on the line coverage button again makes my junit plugin tests work again. I have managed to get it working on some of my projects (the ones where i have little dependencies and not so big code mass) searching for this error message on the net gives me back there seems to be some kind of compiler bug but those posts are from mid 2005 i think they should be solved by now. I am using the Sun 1.5_06 JRE.

/Dave

Dave, this may be linked to defect https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=141930

There is a known problem when running using Sun JDK 1.5
Until we find and solve this issue as a workaround try to use java 1.4 to run your plugins

Well as our plugins are written for the 5.0 compiler that won't work for us, i assume.

I tried to run the test with another JRE and it failed with an classpath problem saying it couldn't find my test class. 

/Dave
No resources available to cover this in 4.4; moving to future
I have encountered this today using IBM JRE 1.5 SR1 with TPTP 4.3.1 candidate driver. This also occurs if line coverage is enabled when launching a new Eclipse runtime workbench.

causedBy.message: LVTT entry for 'allCheckOuts' in class file com/sonyericsson/ides/releasemanager/ui/logic/test/QualityAssurenceHandlerTest does not match any LVT entry
